articles.description: Antoine Griezmann is in the middle of a financial game of tug of war between Atletico Madrid and Barcelona over the clauses in his loan deal
articles.content:
Barcelona are reportedly preparing a lawsuit against Atletico Madrid, over the loan of Antoine Griezmann becoming a permanent transfer next summer.
Griezmann moved back to Atleti in the summer trans… [+1987 chars]

articles.description: "Kane is one of the hardest workers I have seen on his game and he continues to be. A big score is around the corner," says the New Zealand coach
